goals.title: Choose the Best Car to Buy
goals.description: Select the most suitable car based on factors like price, fuel efficiency, safety features, and maintenance costs.

goals.title: Select a University for Higher Education
goals.description: Determine the best university choice considering academic reputation, course offerings, location, and cost.

goals.title: Pick the Ideal Job Offer
goals.description: Evaluate multiple job offers based on salary, career growth, work-life balance, and company culture.

goals.title: Choose a Housing Location
goals.description: Find the best residential area considering factors like accessibility, safety, amenities, and property value.

goals.title: Select Business Investment Strategy
goals.description: Determine the optimal investment strategy considering risk level, return potential, and market conditions.

goals.title: Choose Technology Stack for Project
goals.description: Select the most appropriate technology stack based on scalability, maintenance, community support, and development speed.
